DOC.detailed_description: This prospective study investigate safety efficacy PAE patient prostate cancer suffers acute urinary retention , severe LUTS and/or recurrent complication haematuria . Our hypothesis PAE eliminate need indwell catheter improve IPSS QoL 12 month post-procedure . 1 , 3 , 6 , 9 12 month follow-up .
